name: Boss
text: Get up, <name>. You’re not paid to sleep, you’re paid to get work done.

name: Boss
text: This is the third time this week. My patience is running thin, <name>

name: <name>
text: Sorry sir, it’s just that you’ve extended my hours every day-

name: Boss
text: This is what you get for wasting your time.
I’ve generously given you eight hours to complete your tasks.
Even I could’ve done this in half the time! Now get back to work. Don’t leave until you get this done.
